description: Gets information about the specified command.

parameters.name: commandId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the command for which you want to retrieve information.

nested_items.name: commandId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the command.

nested_items.name: commandArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the command. For example, arn:aws:iot:<region>:<accountid>:command/<commandId>

nested_items.name: namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the command.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The user-friendly name in the console for the command.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A short text description of the command.

nested_items.name: mandatoryParameters
nested_items.description: A list of parameters for the command created.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of a specific parameter used in a command and command execution.

nested_items.name: S
nested_items.description: An attribute of type String. For example:

nested_items.name: B
nested_items.description: An attribute of type Boolean. For example:

nested_items.name: I
nested_items.description: An attribute of type Integer (Thirty-Two Bits).

nested_items.name: L
nested_items.description: An attribute of type Long.

nested_items.name: D
nested_items.description: An attribute of type Double (Sixty-Four Bits).

nested_items.name: BIN
nested_items.description: An attribute of type Binary. For example:

nested_items.name: UL
nested_items.description: An attribute of type unsigned long.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value used to describe the command. This is the value assumed by the parameter if no other value is assigned to it.

nested_items.name: S
nested_items.description: An attribute of type String. For example:

nested_items.name: B
nested_items.description: An attribute of type Boolean. For example:

nested_items.name: I
nested_items.description: An attribute of type Integer (Thirty-Two Bits).

nested_items.name: L
nested_items.description: An attribute of type Long.

nested_items.name: D
nested_items.description: An attribute of type Double (Sixty-Four Bits).

nested_items.name: BIN
nested_items.description: An attribute of type Binary. For example:

nested_items.name: UL
nested_items.description: An attribute of type unsigned long.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the command parameter.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The static payload file for the command.

nested_items.name: contentType
nested_items.description: The content type that specifies the format type of the payload file. This field must use a type/subtype format, such as application/json. For information about various content types, see Common MIME types.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role that you provided when creating the command with AWS-IoT-FleetWise as the namespace.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp, when the command was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp, when the command was last updated.

nested_items.name: deprecated
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the command has been deprecated.

nested_items.name: pendingDeletion
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the command is being deleted.
